scripts.generate:bundle:production: npm run remove:dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --env.plugin=$npm_config_plugin --mode production
scripts.generate:bundle:development: npm run remove:dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --env.plugin=$npm_config_plugin --mode development
scripts.plugin:development: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run webpack:development --plugin=$npm_config_plugin" "npm run watch:webview:json --plugin=$npm_config_plugin" "npm run watch:config:json --plugin=$npm_config_plugin" "npm run server"
scripts.webpack:development: npm run remove:dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --env.plugin=$npm_config_plugin --mode development --config webpack-dev.config.js
scripts.generate:webview:json:clean: npm run remove:json && npm run generate:webview:json --plugin=$npm_config_plugin
scripts.generate:webview:production: npm run generate:bundle:production --plugin=$npm_config_plugin && npm run generate:webview:json:clean --plugin=$npm_config_plugin
scripts.generate:webview:development: npm run generate:bundle:development --plugin=$npm_config_plugin && npm run generate:webview:json:clean --plugin=$npm_config_plugin
scripts.watch:webview:json: npm run remove:json && onchange -i 'src/plugins/**/assets/*.json' 'src/plugins/**/views/**/*.json' -- npm run generate:webview:json --plugin=$npm_config_plugin
scripts.watch:config:json: npm run remove:config && onchange -i 'src/plugins/**/assets/*.json' 'src/plugins/**/views/**/*.json' 'src/plugins/**/server/*' -- npm run generate:config:json --plugin=$npm_config_plugin
scripts.build: npm run build:webview --plugin=$npm_config_plugin && npm run generate:plugin:json --plugin=$npm_config_plugin
scripts.build:webview: npm run generate:webview:production --plugin=$npm_config_plugin && npm run add:webview:bundles && npm run add:webview:jsons
